data.title: Kondou Takashi
data.meta_description: Kondou Takashi, born May 12, 1979 in Okazaki, Aichi, is a Japanese voice actor represented by AMBERnote. Blog

Kondou Takashi, born May 12, 1979 in Okazaki, Aichi, is a Japanese voice actor represented by AMBERnote.
